title: "The procedure entry point" error
body: When I try to open client, an error message reading "The procedure entry point ?sendAdditionalFile@MiniDmpSender@@QAEXPB_W@Z could not be located in the dynamic link library C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe."  Please help, I really don't want to uninstall unless absolutely necessary (this would be the fifth time I've had to reinstall the game this week because of bugs and its really getting on my nerves). I really want to play today so Riot (or anyone) please respond asap.

replies.body: Run the repair tool, no reason to uninstall to fix something.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wUPAfLP2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-31T23:45:00.467+0000)
>
> Run the repair tool, no reason to uninstall to fix something.

whenever I run the repair tool it just tells me everything is fine and doesn't fix anything, maybe I'm not using it correctly?
What file are you running to launch the game, and are you running it as admin?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wUPAfLP2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-01T00:16:47.935+0000)
>
> What file are you running to launch the game, and are you running it as admin?

I'm using the league client.exe file and I've tried running as admin and I get the same results

I am also having this problem now. I am wondering if I will need to reinstall or if this will be patched in a way that fixes the issue. I was able to use the hotfix mentioned above (opening through the other file directory) to open the client, but don't want to have to keep doing that.
I'm just going to uninstall and reinstall. Riot is so unhelpful.

Found a semi-fix from some other thread. Go to Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.148/deploy. After that, find LeagueClient and open the file. It SHOULD work even though there originally wasn't an entry point on the desktop icon or in Riot Games/League of Legends.

> [{quoted}](name=GMon,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wUPAfLP2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-06-01T17:47:06.641+0000)
>
> Found a semi-fix from some other thread. Go to Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/0.0.0.148/deploy. After that, find LeagueClient and open the file. It SHOULD work even though there originally wasn't an entry point on the desktop icon or in Riot Games/League of Legends.

My problem is RADS only has one folder labeled solutions, no projects.
This problem just started for me too
Im in the same boat. The client won't even launch so that I can use the repair tool. I really would rather not uninstall again.
